dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2922 RH: To extend the authority of the Supreme Court Police to protect court officials away from the Supreme Court grounds.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Holding (for himself, Mr. Conyers, Mr. Coble, Mr. Watt, and Mr. Marino) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To extend the authority of the Supreme Court Police to protect court officials away from the Supreme Court grounds.

section.header: Extension of authority of Supreme Court Police to protect court officials off Supreme Court grounds
section.text: Section 6121(b)(2) of title 40, United States Code, is amended by striking 2013 and inserting 2019.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
